definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: According to the company, the large and heavy vacuum tube-based traveling wave tube amplifiers cannot be effectively replaced by GaAs transistors because they a much lower breakdown voltage
sentences.chinese: 根據公司的消息，真空管將不會被砷化鎵晶體管取代。

sentences.english: With this method we will be also able to deposite an amorphous GaAs film.
sentences.chinese: 用此法也能澱積出非晶態砷化鎵薄膜。

sentences.english: Ideal for use for correcting gain shift from temperature fluctuations of GaAs amplifiers.
sentences.chinese: 理想用於糾正從中砷化鎵放大器的使用溫度波動變化。
高穩定性砷化鎵霍爾元件。
